alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 09 at 10:26AM CST until February 12 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to rise, cresting at 17.9 feet Thursday morning. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
